about_the_game:
A Classic Fantasy SRPG

Set in a meticulously crafted and expansive fantasy world, this SRPG offers a turn-based tactical simulation that is simple to grasp yet rich in depth. As you deepen your bonds with allies, the story unfolds through vibrant and engaging character dialogues.

Only you have the power to devise strategies, defeat enemies, and shape the future of the continent. Designed for fantasy fans who crave a classic storyline and exhilarating gameplay, this is an SRPG you won’t want to miss!

A Classic Storyline

A peaceful nation caught in the turmoil of war. The protagonist is a knight-in-training, sent to aid in this dire crisis.

Together with the princess, you must navigate the onslaught of enemy forces, forge bonds with allies, and embark on a journey across the world to reclaim your homeland.

Will you be able to restore the light of peace once more?

An Accessible and Simple System

A Simple System Designed for an Accessible SRPG Experience

This SRPG features a streamlined system focused on ease of play, allowing for smooth and engaging progression without the interruption of separate battle scenes.

With over 40 unique and distinctive allies, you can freely customize your team to suit your strategy. Each character comes equipped with their own exclusive weapon, and various items are available to aid their growth, enabling you to nurture them with care and dedication.

Lively Characters and Witty Dialogue Dynamics

A War Chronicle Woven by Nearly 150 Characters

The story unfolds with moments of depth and gravity, interspersed with lighthearted humor, creating a dynamic and engaging narrative.

With a substantial amount of text, the game allows you to fully immerse yourself in the charm and personality of its richly crafted characters.

About the English Version

The translation is based on machine translation, so there may be discrepancies in nuances and other details.

About the Voice

Characters will speak during selection, but there is no voice acting in the main story.

Additionally, all voice lines are in Japanese.

About the Resolution

Supports only 800 x 600 px.（Supports Full-Screen Mode.）

Recommended Users

  • Fans of Fantasy Worlds

  • Lovers of Traditional SRPGs

  • Enjoyers of Character Interactions
